description: A very simple entree that is fresh with simple ingredients.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Soy free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Chicken Napoli with Basil & Buffalo Mozzarella Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 chicken breasts, sliced fully in half

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a chargrill to medium heat with the canola oil.
Chargrill the chicken breasts for 4 minutes on each side until fully cooked and then remove from the heat.
Layer your chicken breasts with tomato sauce, bocconcini and basil. Garnish with salt, pepper and olive oil.
